description: Comprehensive Australian construction template matrix with NRM Level 4 integration. Covers residential, commercial, healthcare, industrial, and education sectors with realistic GFA values and construction specifications.

specifications.wall_system: Cantilever retaining wall with reinforced concrete footing
specifications.reinforcement: N16 bars @ 200mm centres vertical, N12 @ 300mm horizontal
specifications.drainage: 150mm slotted drainage pipe with gravel backfill
specifications.soil_conditions: Class H to M - moderate to high reactivity
specifications.construction_notes: Cantilever retaining wall, 250mm thick, N40 concrete, engineered design

civil.name: Concrete Retaining Wall - High (6m)
civil.description: High-height concrete retaining wall (6m) - Anchored/tieback cantilever system, specialist engineering

specifications.wall_system: Anchored cantilever retaining wall with ground anchors
specifications.reinforcement: N20 bars @ 200mm centres, heavy mesh, anchor embedment zones
specifications.drainage: 200mm slotted drainage pipe with gravel layer, weepholes @ 2m centres
specifications.soil_conditions: Class M to E - high to extreme reactivity
specifications.construction_notes: Anchored cantilever wall, 350mm thick, N50 concrete, specialist engineering

civil.name: Masonry Retaining Wall (2m)
civil.description: Medium-height masonry retaining wall (2m) - Mortared concrete block construction

specifications.wall_system: Reinforced mortared concrete block retaining wall
specifications.reinforcement: N12 vertical bars @ 400mm centres, N12 horizontal bond beam @ every 4th course
specifications.soil_conditions: Class H to M - moderate to high reactivity
specifications.construction_notes: Reinforced masonry retaining wall, 200mm CMU blocks, engineered design

civil.name: Gabion Retaining Wall (2.5m)
civil.description: Medium-height gabion retaining wall (2.5m) - Rock-filled wire basket system with natural finish

specifications.wall_system: Stepped gabion basket retaining wall (500mm stepped batter)
specifications.basket_type: 1000mm x 500mm x 500mm galvanized wire mesh gabion baskets
specifications.construction_notes: Stepped gabion basket wall, 1000mm wide, rock-filled with natural finish

swap_extensions.description: Swap options for wall systems, roofing, and civil infrastructure that extend the existing system

cladding.description: 110mm face brick + 90mm cavity + 200mm concrete block. Higher thermal and acoustic performance than brick veneer. Recommended for commercial and institutional buildings.
110mm face brick + 90mm cavity + 90mm metal stud + 13mm plasterboard. Fire-rated construction suitable for commercial and premium residential buildings.

roofing.description: Metal deck with membrane waterproofing for commercial flat roofs. Lightweight and durable.

pavement_surface.description: Standard asphalt concrete pavement suitable for medium to heavy traffic. Cost-effective and quick to construct.
Reinforced concrete pavement for heavy-duty applications. Longer lifespan but higher initial cost.
Unsealed gravel surface for low-traffic rural roads and access tracks.

pipe_material.description: Polyvinyl chloride (PVC) pipe - lightweight, corrosion-resistant, cost-effective for sewer applications.
Ductile Iron Cement Lined pipe - high strength, long-lasting, ideal for water mains and high-pressure applications.
Reinforced Concrete Pipe - heavy-duty, suitable for large diameter stormwater and gravity systems.
High-Density Polyethylene pipe - flexible, corrosion-resistant, suitable for water and sewer applications.

base_material.description: Standard crushed rock base course - cost-effective, widely available, suitable for most pavement applications.
Cement-stabilized crushed rock - higher strength, reduced deformation, ideal for heavy-duty applications.
High-quality selected granular material - premium base layer for high-performance pavements.

kerb_type.description: Machine-extruded concrete kerb and gutter - cost-effective, consistent profile, quick installation.
Traditionally formed concrete kerb and gutter - allows custom profiles and architectural finishes.
Low-profile mountable kerb - allows vehicle access, suitable for driveways and crossovers.
